Text.Page:
Between what they steal from our wagons and what they grow on those farms, those Heavens Fall folks eat pretty well! They sing thanks for their bounty every mealtime.

Me, I haven't had more than trail rations! Not fair at all.

I want you to sneak onto that farm and swipe their harvest. Let them know what it's been like for us!

Roots and berries? Dried-out berries? Bwaha!

This is what they've been singin' praises over? Even crazier than I thought!
Get out there and steal me some fruit!
